column4: strange, i am following ubuntu instructions on ATI driver but i get no result in "additional drivers"
Man this is why I dislike linux (at the same time, love it).. its so counterintuitive
from a win background.. so its like im having to learn the alphabet again
i agree with that..but i have a strong desire to learn all about ubuntu....because i HATE windows .....i have to support it at my job, and I absolutely HATE IT  !!
